greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Imaginary part of the function z defined in A131851.
comment: for n > 0: a(A098704(n+1)) = n and abs(a(m)) < n for m < A098704(n+1).
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: z[0] = 0; z[n_] := z[n] = z[Floor[n/2]]*I + Mod[n, 2]; Table[z[n] // Im, {n, 0, 120}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 02 2019 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 22 2007
